data.name: My boss is weird - patch
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is a bit abnormal r18 content patch for my boss
Patch content:
Two sets of R18 animation content for a character. Related content is not limited to tuning and SM content.
All characters are over 18 years old
data.about_the_game:
This DLC is a bit abnormal r18 content patch for my boss
Patch content:
Two sets of R18 animation content for a character. Related content is not limited to tuning and SM content.

data.short_description: This content needs to have a basic game on steam to play.
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This DLC will have characters with sexual behaviors, and related content is not limited to training and SM content.
All characters are over 18 years old
